channel.title: cloud on JellyParks
channel.description: Recent content in cloud on JellyParks

item.title: assumed_role_breadcrumbs
item.description: Cloudtrail events in AWS offer a lot of visibility into the calls that roles leverage within the platform. Sometimes tracking the original source of the activity can be challenging. When users and other aws services from one account assume role into another hunting the origin can take a bit of backtracking.

item.title: cloudtrail_anomaly_detection
item.description: Overview of an anomaly detection platform using cloudtrail logs, athena, lambda, s3, and dynamodb

item.title: emr_security_woes
item.description: Walkthrough of Elastic Map Reduce compromise, and why it should never be directly exposed to the Internet.

item.title: role_credential_revoking
item.description: IAM roles can have all current credentials revoked. This can be great to stop an attacker, but at what cost?
